lines: I'm sorry. You can only play through this episode if you are employed in a steady job. You can go to the WORK ICON, land a job and return.
The company where you work is making drastic cutbacks. In the last few months three departments have been reduced to the bare bones. Your services may be next.
Since your Confidence is generally high, you must have suspected that your relationshop with this company was in danger. You switch work settings and become more successful.

Your Confidence has not been extremely strong. Perhaps your move was premature. It takes you a while to find another position like the one you left, but eventually you are more secure. You do not suffer financially, but
emotionally you become more anxious and even less confident.

According to your personality status, your Confidence is generally low. This makes it difficult for you to find another job. Your Resources decrease by $2000. Emotionally, you suffer setbacks in the Confidence and Calmness areas.

Your confidence shows through, and the upper level executives at work begin to think that you may be a valuable asset during this period of transition. They offer you a promotion. You will receive a $2000 bonus.
Unfortunately, after a few months, the corporation goes under and you lose your position. It seems like forever until you are back doing what you want.
The company begins to regain its profitability, and you continue to climb. Check your Resources for the surprise in your next paycheck.
Taking a hard line, eh? The company will offer you a $10000 "incentive" if you will stay on.
Unfortunately, after a few months, the corporation goes under and you lose your job.
The company begins to regain its profitability, and you continue to climb. Check your Resources for a little surprise in your paycheck.
I guess you are determined to be out on your own. Your confidence carries you through to the next job. You land a secure position in a more stable company.
I guess you feel that the company wouldn't let you go. That IS a sign of confidence.
In fact, they don't let you go, but unfortunately, the company goes out of business and you are stuck with no job.
In fact, the company realizes that you are indispensable and offers you a raise to stay on. Do you:
